info_block.text:
<b>[Product Updates] Unsupported Policies

The following policies are not supported in ApigeeX and the associated alternate policies/suggested fix must be implemented during the migration
1. ConcurrentRatelimit - SpikeArrest Policy
2. ConnectorCallout - Obtain Google OAuth Token
3. DeleteOAuthV1Info - OAuth v2 Policy
4. GetOAuthV1Info - OAuth v2 Policy
5. OAuthV1 - OAuth v2 Policy
6. Ldap - Not supported
7. StatisticsCollector - DataCapture Policy
